name: postez
description: Utility tool for dynamically generate interfaces from PostgreSQL

scripts.compile: npm run format && npm run lint
scripts.compile:dev: npm run format && npm run lint && npm run watch
scripts.version: npm run format && git add -A src
scripts.build: npm run build:prod && npm run copy
scripts.minor: npm run build && npm version minor && npm publish && npm publish --tag next
scripts.major: npm run build && npm version major && npm publish && npm publish --tag next
scripts.patch: npm run build && npm version patch && npm publish && npm publish --tag next

author: Daniel Ivanov
